event-group.description: These are canvas scaling functions for use of convience. The tutorial has numerous calls and use for canvas scale and it's just easier. Your projects may not need this as a function and can embed the code.
event-group.title: Functions

event-group.description: Numerica tracker that follows the fingers and report X and Y position.
event-group.title: TrackTouch

event-group.description: Controls for a floating(center on touch) based joystick. The method for hiding the control is arbitrary and you can do any way you want.
event-group.title: Floating Analog Joystick(fana)

variable.comment: distance the stick can move from center
variable.name: radius

action.name: Set value
action.param: distance(fanaPad.X, fanaPad.Y, Function.Call("ScaleX", touchID), Function.Call("ScaleY", touchID) )

action.name: Set value
action.param: angle(fanaPad.X, fanaPad.Y, Function.Call("ScaleX", touchID), Function.Call("ScaleY", touchID) )

sub-events.comment: demo uses a simple dead zone.
